name: PeopleStox
tag_list: online-marketplace, talent-marketplace, experience-marketplace, work-from-home, sell-your-talents, marketplace-for-experiences
overview:
PeopleStox is a virtual marketplace that gives people an unprecedented way to sell their talents or services.

www.peoplestox.com allows people to get their work in front of thousands of potential buyers. These users range from artists to entrepreneurs-can sell their services to Fans for instant cash.

The site features two categories of Experiences: face-to-face and remote. Face-to-face Experiences are unique services delivered in person, from sailing classes to gourmet dinners prepared by a chef in the comfort of your own home. Remote Experiences do not require an in-person meeting, giving Dreamers an opportunity to connect with Fans from all around the world. Examples of remote experiences include graphic design, Web programming, custom songs, carbon portraits and even recipes. There is no limit to the number or type of Experiences offered on the site.

On the PeopleStox platform, sellers price their services with out any restrictions. We believe that its your talent and you should price it. Sellers get the proceeds instantly. We don’t have internal accounts that hold your money hostage.
